data.text: A Good Handlebar Bag with a See-Through Map Pocket on the Top

Can anyone recommend a good handlebar bag with a see-through map pocket (12 cm x 23 cm or larger) on the top of it? Preferably waterproof and click-on/off but neither absolutely essential. Bike has straight / flat handlebar.

I‚Äôm in the market for the same thing, the Ortlieb handlebar pack QR with the add-on map sleeve is what I just bought yesterday. I‚Äôve literally looked at what seems like hundreds, I hope it‚Äôs as good as my research.

data.text: I've literally just received the same two items this morning. I'm well impressed with everything about it. I was cautious about the fixing of the unit but it's solid as a rock. The map case is twice the size of the top of the bag so it folds in half then flip it over once you have ridden over the edge. I bought the lock version but to be honest if I was going to be out of site from my bike I'd take the bag with me. As someone could just scoop out your contents anyway.
